languages.text: Свежая кровь пропитывает бесценные шелковые покрывала, уродливым пятном расползаясь под трупом... Вашим трупом.
Fresh blood soaks into the priceless silk coverlets, forming an ugly stain under the corpse... your corpse.
languages.original_text: Свежая кровь пропитывает бесценные шелковые покрывала, уродливым пятном расползаясь под трупом... Вашим трупом.

traits.locale_text: The fresh blood soaks into the priceless silk coverlets, forming an ugly stain under the corpse... Your corpse.

languages.text: 鲜血浸透昂贵的丝绸被单，在横陈的尸体下染出一片丑陋的血污……那是你的尸体。
languages.original_text: Fresh blood soaks into the priceless silk coverlets, forming an ugly stain under the corpse... your corpse.

traits.locale_text: 鲜血浸透昂贵的丝绸被单，在横陈的尸体下染出一片丑陋的血污……那是你的尸体。

languages.text: La sangre fresca empapa la carísima colcha de seda, formando una fea mancha debajo del cadáver... tu cadáver.
languages.original_text: Fresh blood soaks into the priceless silk coverlets, forming an ugly stain under the corpse... your corpse.

traits.locale_text: La sangre fresca empapa la carísima colcha de seda, formando una fea mancha debajo del cadáver... tu cadáver.

languages.text: Du sang frais imprègne le luxueux couvre-lit de soie, formant une grande tache écarlate sous un cadavre... le vôtre.
languages.original_text: Fresh blood soaks into the priceless silk coverlets, forming an ugly stain under the corpse... your corpse.

traits.locale_text: Du sang frais imprègne le luxueux couvre-lit de soie, formant une grande tache écarlate sous un cadavre... le vôtre.

languages.text: Frisches Blut durchtränkt die unbezahlbare Seidendecke und formt einen hässlichen Fleck unter der Leiche ... deiner Leiche.
languages.original_text: Fresh blood soaks into the priceless silk coverlets, forming an ugly stain under the corpse... your corpse.

traits.locale_text: Frisches Blut durchtränkt die unbezahlbare Seidendecke und formt einen hässlichen Fleck unter der Leiche ... deiner Leiche.

languages.text: 鮮血が高価なシルクの上掛けに染み込み、死体の…そう、あなたの死体の下に醜い染みを作っていく。
languages.original_text: Fresh blood soaks into the priceless silk coverlets, forming an ugly stain under the corpse... your corpse.

traits.locale_text: 鮮血が高価なシルクの上掛けに染み込み、死体の…そう、あなたの死体の下に醜い染みを作っていく。

languages.text: Paha biçilemez, ipek yatak örtüsü; taze kanı emerek cesedin altında... Senin cesedinin altında çirkin bir leke oluşturuyor.
languages.original_text: Fresh blood soaks into the priceless silk coverlets, forming an ugly stain under the corpse... your corpse.

traits.locale_text: Paha biçilemez ipek yatak örtüsü, taze kanı emerek cesedin altında çirkin bir leke oluşturuyor... Senin cesedinin altında.
